bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: Paddle C API unittest cannot pass
bug.description: There are several unit tests not consider the situation when PYTHON or SWIG_PY not enabled. They are: <denchmark-code>48 - test_TrainerOnePass (Failed) 60 - test_v2_api (Failed) 61 - test_v2_layer (Failed) 62 - test_v2_rnn_layer (Failed) 63 - test_topology (Failed) 64 - reader_tests (Failed) 65 - test_ploter (Failed) </denchmark-code>
